'''James Harris''' is the judge who handled Addison's adoption of Henry.

==History==
When Henry and Addison had their final adoption hearing, Judge Harris was assigned to the case. Everything looked good until he got a fax from [[Mildred Clemons]], who had some concerns. He ordered further evaluation and said they'd set another court date.

Jake went to visit James and said that the file was not the whole story. James gave him 30 seconds to talk. Jake explained about Lily and Angela and the drug dealer and said he had to protect his family. He said he would do the same for Henry. He then said he'd leave Addison if that's what it took to keep Henry and Addison together because they needed to be together.

Jake's speech persuaded him and he signed her final adoption papers.

==Relationships==
===Familial===
He has four daughters.

==Career==
He is a judge.
